transcripts.text: So all that's left is to launch the Poko Haram, catch him and destroy him.

Fidelity and honor, this is the motto of our army.  The Boko Haram soldier will learn from her.  Her supreme leader, Idriss Déby-Hitno, has meticulously prepared the counter-offensive, whether frontal or asymmetric, the brave soldiers of Forte.  Chardian soldiers, Chardian soldiers, Chardian, Chardian, Chardian, they are going to catch Boko Haram on two hands.  Chardian soldiers, Chardian soldiers, Chardian, Chardian, they are going to catch Boko Haram on two hands.

Boko Haram escaped, the Supreme Chief of the Army subdivided the Lacusre area in several sectors.  The attack by land, air and river against the Boko Haram sect is imminent.  Everything is ready, ready to launch Operation.  We are going to the stadium.  We are going to the stadium.  We are going to the stadium.
